"Matter Board":
"About the Matter Board

The Matter Board serves as a guide to move the game's story along. Complete each Matter on the Board by acquiring the items dropped by the specified enemies.

When you complete a Matter hunt, the adjacent Matters will be unlocked. Keep going until you reach a \"Key Matter\", which reveals the next story development.
